content.title: Pleasant Hill Lanes - Family Bowling Since 1962
content.meta_description: Family owned and operated bowling center in Pleasant Hill. Birthday parties, corporate events, leagues, and open bowling since 1962.
content.hero_title: Family Owned and Operated Bowling Center
content.about_text: Opened in 1962 by Robert Maclary, Pleasant Hill Lanes has been serving the community for over 60 years. We're a family-owned bowling center that's dedicated to providing fun for all ages. From casual open bowling to competitive leagues, birthday parties to corporate events, we create memories that last a lifetime.

features.title: Open Bowling
features.description: Walk-in bowling available daily with modern lanes and automatic scoring

features.title: Daily Specials
features.description: Great deals throughout the week including student discounts

features.title: Bowling Leagues
features.description: Join our competitive leagues for bowlers of all skill levels

features.title: Party Packages
features.description: Perfect venue for birthday parties and special celebrations

carousel_items.title: Summer Bowling Special
carousel_items.description: Beat the heat with our cool summer bowling packages! Enjoy discounted rates, free shoe rentals, and refreshing beverages. Perfect for families looking for indoor fun during hot summer days.

carousel_items.title: Corporate Team Building
carousel_items.description: Strengthen your team with our corporate bowling packages. Professional event coordination, catering options, and private lane reservations available. Great for employee appreciation and team bonding.

carousel_items.title: Birthday Party Packages
carousel_items.description: Make it a strike celebration! Our birthday party packages include lane time, shoe rentals, party host, decorations, and delicious food options. Create memories that will last a lifetime.
